name: Thunderbird Style - Simple Silver/Gray
description: This is a simple silver/gray style that I created simply by modifying the userChrome.css file to remove the transparency in the toolbar area of the new Thunderbird 5.0 release, and replace it with a simple light gray background.  If you want the same style but with greyscale folder icons, please see my modified version of this style at http://userstyles.org/styles/50238/thunderbird-style-silver-gray-with-folder-icons
